content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to recent rumours, but as far as I know, there have been discussions over the years about a possible continuation of the Firefly story, but nothing has been officially confirmed. Several of the cast members have expressed interest and willingness to come back, but it is ultimately up to the creators and studios to decide if and when it will happen. Some fans have also launched online campaigns urging Netflix or other streaming services to pick up the series. However, any news or updates on this matter remain scarce or nonexistent.
